dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: Ola joins Uber, denies implementing phone model-based pricing in India
News Content: (Reuters) - Indian ride-hailing firm Ola Consumer on Friday said it does not set fares based on a user's phone model, a day after global rival Uber denied allegations of differential pricing for Android and Apple phones.

Ola and Uber received notices from an Indian government consumer body on Thursday, directed by consumer affairs minister Pralhad Joshi, following media reports and complaints that Apple users were charged higher for the same ride than those using phones that ran on Android operating systems.

"We have a homogenous pricing structure for all our customers and we do not differentiate based on the operating system of the user's cellphone for identical rides," an Ola Consumer spokesperson said.

"We have clarified the same to the Central Consumer Protection Authority (CCPA) today, and we will work with them to clear any misunderstanding in this regard."

Apple and Google have not yet responded to Reuters' requests for comments.

(Reporting by Nandan Mandayam in Bengaluru; Editing by Janane Venkatraman)



Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
} 
Do not generate output that isn't in properly formatted JSON.

```json
{
  "reasoning": "The news article discusses allegations of differential pricing by ride-hailing companies Ola and Uber in India, specifically targeting Apple users. However, both companies have denied these allegations, and Apple itself has not been directly implicated in any wrongdoing. The news is more about the ride-hailing companies' pricing practices rather than Apple's business operations or financial performance. Given that Apple is not directly involved in the controversy and the issue does not pertain to its core business, the impact on Apple's stock price is likely to be minimal. There is no clear positive or negative catalyst for Apple in this news.",
  "company_name": "Apple Inc.",
  "company_symbol": "AAPL",
  "news_headline": "Ola joins Uber, denies implementing phone model-based pricing in India",
  "probability_of_stock_price_rise": 0.1,
  "probability_of_stock_price_fall": 0.1
}
```
